caseTitle: Against involvement of Zafar Iqbal Gondal, Former Chairman, EOBI, DG Investment and DG HR, etc in multibillion scam in the Employees Old Age Benefit Institute
tagline: The Director General FIA is directed to conduct inquiry/investigation in the cases pertaining to alleged corruption in making investment by the EOBI in 18 properties as well as in respect of any transaction of the EOBI wherein it is noticed that corruption or corrupt practices have been committed by the responsible persons.
